sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Chicago U. S. Courthouse Cession Act.

sections.heading: The State of Illinois hereby cedes to the United States
sections.text:
concurrent civil and criminal jurisdiction over the United States
Courthouse Annex and Parking Facility, described as follows:

sections.heading: Cession shall be effective only upon the filing of an
sections.text:
acceptance by the United States. Federal jurisdiction shall end
whenever the United States shall cease to own, lease or use for national
purposes the lands or improvements thereon.

sections.heading: Nothing in this Act shall be construed to deprive the State
sections.text: of Illinois of any of its jurisdiction over the above described lands.
